title: Batch Tamarin Configuration
description: JSON schema for Tamarin prover automation configuration

global_max_cores.description: Maximum number of CPU cores available system-wide for all tasks (integer or 'max' for system maximum)

global_max_memory.description: Maximum memory in GB available system-wide for all tasks (integer or 'max' for system maximum)

default_timeout.description: Default timeout in seconds for tasks (used when task doesn't specify resources)

output_directory.description: Base directory path for all output files

tamarin_versions.description: Named aliases for different Tamarin prover executables

path.description: File path to the Tamarin prover executable

version.description: Version identifier for this Tamarin prover

test_success.description: Whether this Tamarin executable passed connectivity tests

tasks.description: Named tasks, each defining a Tamarin execution configuration

theory_file.description: Path to the .spthy theory file to analyze

tamarin_versions.description: List of Tamarin version aliases to run this task on

output_file_prefix.description: Prefix for the output file, filled with _{lemma}_{tamarin-version}

lemmas.description: List of lemmas to prove. If empty or omitted, all lemmas will be proved using --prove

name.description: Name of the lemma to prove

tamarin_versions.description: List of Tamarin version aliases to run this lemma on. If not specified, inherits from task

tamarin_options.description: Additional command-line options to pass to Tamarin for this lemma. Overrides task-level options

preprocess_flags.description: Preprocessor flags to pass to Tamarin using -D=flag format for this lemma. Overrides task-level flags

resources.description: Resource allocation for this lemma. If not specified, inherits from task

max_cores.description: Maximum CPU cores for this lemma

max_memory.description: Maximum memory in GB for this lemma

timeout.description: Timeout in seconds for this lemma

tamarin_options.description: Additional command-line options to pass to Tamarin

preprocess_flags.description: Preprocessor flags to pass to Tamarin using -D=flag format

resources.description: Resource allocation for this task. If not specified, defaults to 4 cores, 8GB RAM, 3600s timeout

max_cores.description: Maximum CPU cores for this task (default: 4)

max_memory.description: Maximum memory in GB for this task (default: 8)

timeout.description: Timeout in seconds for this task (default: default_timeout from config)
